text: Candlebox is an American rock band. They are based in Seattle, Washington. Since its formation in 1990, the group has released seven studio albums, several charting singles, a compilation, and a CD+DVD. Category:1990s American music groups Category:2000s American music groups Category:2010s American music groups Category:Musical groups established in 1990 Category:1990 establishments in the United States
title: Candlebox
